headline: Photography Center At Essex Crossing
abstract: A four-story, 40,000-square-foot space will bring the photography centerâ€™s exhibition and education spaces together under the same roof.
lead_paragraph: The International Center of Photography will reopen in a four-story, 40,000-square-foot space in the massive new Essex Crossing development on the Lower East Side on Jan. 25. It is the fourth location for the museum since its opening in 1974 and brings the exhibition and education spaces under the same roof for the first time this century.
keywords: I Can Make You Feel Good (Exhibit)
CONTACT HIGH: A Visual History of Hip-Hop (Exhibit)
